THE DAY AFTER THE WEDDING RECEPTION

content.author: Pooja
content.message: Rishi?

content.message: You have reached Bangalore?

content.message: Yeah sweetheart. And I am totally drained

content.message: Rishi?

content.message: Because it's so gorgeous‚Ä¶you liked it, didn‚Äôt you?

content.message: WHAT IS THE PROBLEM?

content.author: Pooja
content.message: Natasha's saree got torn yesterday night

content.author: Pooja
content.message: It caught something sharp, and there's a long tear in it

content.author: Pooja

content.message: WHAT!!!

content.message: Are you sure you added the right number of 0s ?

content.author: Pooja
content.message: I have known her for 20 years now. In these matters, she is a b**ch

FOUR DAYS LATER

content.author: Pooja
content.message: Hi Natasha

content.message: Hi bestie! How have you been?
